task.title: Update Elasticsearch Pipelines
task.shortdesc: version 2.3.0.0 includes an enhanced Elasticsearch destination that uses the Elasticsearch HTTP API. To upgrade pipelines that use the Elasticsearch destination, you must verify that Java 8 is installed and remove the Elasticsearch stage library from the blacklist property for stage libraries.

context.note: The Elasticsearch version 5 stage library is compatible with all versions of Elasticsearch. Earlier stage library versions have been removed.
